abstract: United Nations Committee on Elimination of Racial Discrimination publilshes report urging Netherlands to ban Black Pete, character popular with children who is often portrayed by white people wearing blackface makeup.
lead_paragraph: After a report said the character promoted racial stereotyping, the Dutch government said it would encourage discussion about racism, but dismissed the idea of a ban.

headline.main: U.N. Urges the Netherlands to Stop Portrayals of ‘Black Pete’ Character
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | United Nations; Panel Urges Dutch to Eliminate a Character’s Racial Stereotyping

snippet: After a report said the character promoted racial stereotyping, the Dutch government said it would encourage discussion about racism, but dismissed the idea of a ban.
